title: Hunter Hunted
overview:
A scientific animal documentary TV series developed by the National 
Geographic Channel that centers on that elusive and dangerous 
relationship between predator and prey, especially when the predators 
are wild animals and the prey are human beings. It takes known attacks 
between man and beast in order to break down what occurred and the 
reason with the latest forensic science techniques and the expertise of 
animal behaviorists and scientists.
